### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(x=-17.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-17.0, y=-50.0) and transport belt (position x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and transport belt (position x=-15.5, y=-51.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=-14.5, y=-51.5) and burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-50.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-50.5) and wooden chest (position x=-13.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron Ore Mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and transport belt (position x=-15.5, y=-51.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=-14.5, y=-51.5) and burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-50.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-50.5) and wooden chest (position x=-13.5, y=-49.5)

### Furnace at position(x=-10.0, y=-49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=-10.0, y=-49.0) and wooden chest (position x=-16.5, y=-47.5)

### Transport Belt System
Consists of following entities
-  BeltGroup (position x=-17.5, y=-51.5) and BeltGroup (position x=-13.5, y=-48.5)
-  BeltGroup (position x=-15.5, y=-47.5) and BeltGroup (position x=-12.5, y=-49.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using inserter
-  Make sure the inserter has a source of items to insert before attempting to insert items
-  Ensure the inserter is fueled before attempting to insert items

### Errors when using furnace
-  Make sure the furnace has fuel before attempting to smelt items
-  Ensure the furnace source is not full before attempting to insert items

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  -  `transport-belt`: int
  -  `burner-mining-drill`: int
  -  `stone-furnace`: int
  -  `iron-ore`: int
  -  `iron-plate`: int
